channel.title: Unglued Food - Gluten-Free Halloween Desserts
channel.description: Delicious gluten-free Halloween dessert recipes with AI-generated images. Perfect for celiac disease, gluten sensitivity, and health-conscious celebrations.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2025 Unglued Food. All rights reserved.

item.title: Ghostly White Chocolate Mousse - Gluten-Free Halloween Dessert
item.description: Ethereal white chocolate mousse that melts in your mouth, perfect for Halloween with ghostly presentation and spooky charm. Elegant gluten-free dessert with silky smooth texture.

item.title: Pumpkin Spice Cheesecake Bars - Gluten-Free Halloween Dessert
item.description: Creamy pumpkin spice cheesecake bars with gluten-free graham crust, perfect autumn flavors in every bite. Rich and creamy with warm spices.

item.title: Chocolate Graveyard Pudding - Fun Halloween Dessert
item.description: Rich chocolate pudding dessert with cookie crumb dirt and spooky graveyard decorations, perfect Halloween treat for kids and adults. Interactive and fun!

item.title: Orange and Black Chocolate Tart - Elegant Halloween Dessert
item.description: Elegant layered chocolate tart with orange and black Halloween colors, sophisticated gluten-free dessert perfect for adult Halloween parties.

item.title: Spider Web Brownies - Gluten-Free Halloween Brownies
item.description: Fudgy gluten-free brownies decorated with intricate white chocolate spider web patterns, spooky and delicious Halloween treat.

item.title: Witch Hat Chocolate Cupcakes - Halloween Gluten-Free Treats
item.description: Dark chocolate cupcakes topped with pointed chocolate cones to create spooky witch hat decorations, fun Halloween treats for everyone.

item.title: Candy Corn Panna Cotta - Elegant Halloween Dessert
item.description: Layered vanilla panna cotta in candy corn colors - yellow, orange, and white stripes create a perfect Halloween dessert. Elegant and naturally gluten-free.

item.title: Poison Caramel Apples - Spooky Halloween Treats
item.description: Classic caramel apples with a spooky twist - glossy red coating and poison bottle labels make these perfect Halloween treats.

item.title: Black Velvet Halloween Cake - Dramatic Gluten-Free Layer Cake
item.description: Dramatic black velvet layer cake with orange cream cheese frosting, the ultimate showstopper Halloween dessert. Gluten-free masterpiece!

item.title: Mummy Chocolate Truffles - Halloween Gluten-Free Confections
item.description: Rich dark chocolate truffles wrapped in white chocolate to look like mummies, adorable and delicious Halloween confections.
